description: Constraints, facet definitions, and display definitions for FireCloud Library
title: Library attribute definitions, v1

consentCodes.NCU: Use of the data is limited to non-commercial use.
consentCodes.NPU: Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
consentCodes.NCTRL: Data can be used as a control set ONLY within the bounds of other specified data use limitations (e.g. only for cancer studies).
consentCodes.RS-PD: Use of the data is limited to pediatric research.
consentCodes.NAGR: Use of the data includes aggregate level analysis to address research questions (e.g., determine variant frequencies across the general population) ONLY within the bounds of other specified data use limitations.
consentCodes.NMDS: Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms) ONLY within the bounds of other specified data use limitations.
consentCodes.GRU: For health/medical/biomedical purposes and other biological research, including the study of population origins or ancestry.
consentCodes.HMB: Use of the data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.
consentCodes.RS-G: Use of the data is limited to studies of particular gender.
consentCodes.DS: Use of the data must be related to a particular disease.

renderHint.wording: Select at least one primary limitation.

___library:NPU.title: Future use by for-profit entities is prohibited

___library:RS-G.title: Future use is limited to research involving a particular gender

___library:ethnicity.inputHint: e.g. Caucasians, African-Americans, Latino, East Asians, South Asians, Finnish, Non-Finnish Europeans; include all relevant
___library:ethnicity.title: Reported Ethnicity

___library:HMB.title: Future use is limited for health/medical/biomedical research

___library:RS-PD.title: Future use is limited to pediatric research

___library:studyDesign.inputHint: e.g. Case/Control, Tumor/Normal, Trio/Twin/Family, Prospective Longitudinal Cohort, Cases only - somatic, Cases only - germline, Controls
___library:studyDesign.title: Study Design

___library:dataFileFormats.inputHint: e.g. VCF, BAM, TXT, TSV, BCR XML, BED, GTF, GCT; Tag all relevant
___library:dataFileFormats.title: Data File Formats

___library:projectName.inputHint: e.g. TCGA, TopMed, ExAC ; tag all relevant associated projects
___library:projectName.title: Project Name

___library:DS.title: Future use is limited to research involving the following disease area(s)

___library:GRU.title: Data is available for future general research use

___library:dulvn.description: Structured Data Use Limitations Version Number
___library:dulvn.title: Structured Data Use Limitations  Version Number

___library:numSubjects.inputHint: Number of participants the data maps to
___library:numSubjects.title: No. of Subjects

___library:NAGR.title: Future use of aggregate-level data for general research purposes is prohibited

___library:requiresExternalApproval.inputHint: i.e. approval from a second source is required in order to access the data
___library:requiresExternalApproval.title: Requires External Approval

___library:dataCategory.inputHint: e.g. Simple Nucleotide Variation (SNVs), Raw Sequencing data, Copy Number Variation, Structural Variation, Expression Quantification, Transcriptome Assembly, DNA-Methylation, Clinical phenotypes, Biospecimen metadata
___library:dataCategory.title: Data Category

___library:reference.inputHint: e.g. GRCh37/hg19, GRCh38/hg38; To which genome build the data was aligned, if relevant
___library:reference.title: Genome Reference Version

___library:IRB.title: Requester must provide documentation of local IRB/REC approval

___library:dataAccessInstructions.inputHint: Users will see this message when attempting to access a workspace they are unauthorized to enter. Leave blank for a default message with the Contact Email above.
___library:dataAccessInstructions.title: Data Access Instructions

___library:NCTRL.title: Future use as a control set for diseases other than those specified is prohibited

___library:NMDS.title: Future use for methods research (analytic/software/technology development) outside the bounds of the other specified restrictions is prohibited

wording.questionnaire: Set Data Use Limitations by answering a questionnaire
wording.orsp: Retrieve Data Use Limitations from Broad ORSP
wording.skip: I would like to skip this step

___library:useLimitationOption.title: Choose one of the available options to define Data Use Limitations

___library:datatype.inputHint: e.g. Whole Exome, Whole Genome, Exome Panel, Genotyping Array, RNA-Seq, Methylation Array; include all relevant
___library:datatype.title: Experimental Strategy
